snippet: The cutoff last October came as a shock, an official said, because the United States observed it immediately, withholding money that had already been allocated or spent.
abstract: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization remains engaged in effort to cut back programs, reduce costs and raise emergency money, one year after the United States cut off its financing in October 2011.
lead_paragraph: The cutoff last October came as a shock, an official said, because the United States observed it immediately, withholding money that had already been allocated or spent.

headline.seo: Cutoff of U.S. Money Leads Unesco to Slash Programs
headline.main: Cutoff of U.S. Money Leads Unesco to Slash Programs and Seek Emergency Aid
headline.print_headline: Cutoff of U.S. Money Leads Unesco to Slash Programs and Seek Emergency Aid

keywords.value: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
